name: places/ChIJh-9cg61ZwokR6-mGtmESUyc
formattedAddress: 851 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 851 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
In selling our condo we found Nicole Hay a step above other real estate agents in NYC. Nicole was always prompt and prepared. She listened and offered honest advice. The unique technology used by Nicole and her team to find the right buyers for our property was a plus. Her photos and description captured the unique quality of our home and her organized showings resulted in multiple offers from qualified buyers in just a few weeks. Nicole was able to negotiate an acceptable offer where two previous agents could not. Her level of service made the difference.
In addition, Nicole went out of her way to connect us to Oz Moving Movers to ease our concerns of our moving back to West coast. We would definitely use Nicole again for future real estate opportunities.

originalText.text: Nicole is an enthusiastic, knowledgeable, organized,  detailed-oriented professional with outstanding people skills.  We had the pleasure of working with Nicole on the purchase of our new home. She was mindful of our interests and needs and our price range. She helped us quickly find the home of our dreams and Nicole guided us through the cumbersome offer to agreement negotiations and co-op application. I was amazed by how quickly she got answers to our questions. Nicole was also able to suggest an appropriate mortgage broker and attorney.  I highly, highly, HIGHLY recommend Nicole Hay to you.

originalText.text:
I would highly recommend Nicole and her team. As a first-time home buyer, I had several questions during each stage of the process. Beginning with our initial phone conversation, Nicole ushered me through the home-buying journey with ease.

Working with Nicole was as painless as can be. She is highly responsive, which is something I expected coming from a fast-paced industry. She is available at all hours of the day by phone and text, which is critical in a market that moves quickly. Nicole is also very good with technology - something I can especially appreciate as a younger home buyer.

What I valued most about Nicole is that she kept me honest and was never pushy. For example, after I added a few listings to my target list that fell outside my desired geography, she challenged me to think about whether I wanted to spend time there. Relatedly, Nicole never pushed me to look at homes that were outside my price range.

Nicole has an entire support team behind her, including a board package expert and assistant who were both fantastic. But to be clear - Nicole was highly involved every step of the way.

Nicole was also an effective liaison between me, the sellers, sellers’ agent, attorneys, and other third parties. She prioritized my concerns and fought for me as a buyer. Most notably, she was able to negotiate an attractive price for me (below ask, which is rare in this market). She successfully fought to incorporate additional seller concessions into the contract which I hadn’t considered, including repair work to the unit prior to my ownership. It was during the negotiating stage where Nicole’s experience really shined through.

Nicole has several connections in the broader industry who were crucial to a smooth process. She recommended an attorney and a lender who I ultimately decided to partner with. It was her lending relationship that offered me the most attractive rate. Nicole even gave me recommendations for painters and movers, which was beyond the scope of her role.

Lastly, on a personal level, Nicole is down-to-earth, energetic, and fun to work with. She has a unique gift in that she can connect with people of all different backgrounds. I look forward to working with Nicole and her team again when it comes time for my next home purchase.

originalText.text: Nicole is wonderful. As first time home buyers, Nicole first got to know my wife and I and listened to us well to help us identify our needs. We had a lot of questions coming into NYC from out of state. Nicole worked tirelessly with us to help evaluate several places and ultimately discover our perfect home on the Upper West Side. We’re grateful to her for being thoughtful and skilled through the home buying process. Cheers, and thank you again, Nicole!

originalText.text: We worked with Nicole when we purchased our apartment in Manhattan and she really did an outstanding job. She always goes above and beyond and I appreciate that she always had our showings so well-organized so to not waste any time. She has a great eye for value and will do whatever it takes to get the deal that you want. She’s a true professional. A+++++
